title: Illegal abortion
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Guy Glover and Robin Spry
brief_description: A dramatization that illustrates the situation of a young couple, particularly of the young woman, faced with an unwanted pregnancy and desiring an abortion forbidden by law. The film portrays her dilemma from the time the pregnancy is confirmed by her doctor to the harrowing moments in a back room where it is terminated by an illegal practitioner. Photographed by Robert Nichol. Edited by Roy Ayton Sound by Victor Merrill. Cast includes: Sabina Fircks, Frank Heron, Elaine Ives Cameron, Ken James, Bill Lynn, Walter Massey, Vladimir Rajewsky, David Schurmann
